page.title: 19Andoversford School 2
page.content: Only one person that we talked to liked the school dinners.All the others thought that they were horrible. The pupils are taught English,Maths,History and Topic work. The teachers liked the children but prefered working with infants.The children there are generally good but there is always "That one". The children are taken out to many places on trips which they all enjoy. The school does not have an electric bell system -one of the children goes round with a hand bell at home time. The school has had two terrapin buildings added and a staff room since it was built.
